newsitem.title: ESTONIA: ESTONIA - BALTIKA H1 NET PROFIT 5.9 MLN KROONS.
newsitem.headline: ESTONIA - BALTIKA H1 NET PROFIT 5.9 MLN KROONS.

text.p: Estonian clothing company Baltika said on Thursday that its net profit was 5.9 million kroons in the first six months of the year, which it said was up 32 percent from the same period last year.
Baltika's net turnover was 108.8 million kroons, up 23 percent from the half-year results of 1996, it added in a statement.

A substantial rise in turnover was achieved by increasing sales in the markets of Estonia, a rise of 101 percent, in the rest of the Baltics, 127 percent, and in Russia and Ukraine, up by 125.5 percent.
The six-month profit confirmed its expected 1997 profit figure of 16 million kroons, the company added.
